package.name: PhD
package.description: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
package.notes: Fixed bug#66408 (Wrong style file in chm documentation). (Andy Burton)

release.notes: - Initial release

(Hannes) - Print notes inline with its title, reported by Philip Olson. (Hannes) - Check if we have an open "{" before we print "}". (Hannes) - Escape the version info. (Richard Q.) - Fixed variablelist titles. (Hannes) - Fixed table info titles. (Hannes) - Fixed empty table cells, reported by Mark Wiesemann. (Hannes) - Fixed table title markup, reported by Richard Q. (Hannes) - Fixed non-closing b element for empty <title />s, reported by Joshua Thompson and Philip Olson. (Hannes) - Fixed bug#43013 (Description rather then function name for right arrows on extension pages). (Richard Q.) - Fixed bug#42906 (docs.php.net bold instead of links). (Hannes) - Fixed bug#42860 (cannot render <orgname> element). (Hannes) - Fixed bug#42845 (Copyright page has no TOC). (Hannes) - Language support (for autogenerated texts): * Bulgarian (by Kouber Saparev) * Czech (by Jakub Vrana) * German (by Oliver Albers) * Italian (by Marco Cucinato) * Japanese (by TAKAGI Masahiro) * Polish (by Jaroslaw Glowacki) * Brazilian Portuguese (by Diego Feitosa) * Romanian (by Simion Onea)
